attributes.title: Don’t even start bruh
attributes.review: Come on Donny. For real???????? You didn’t think we’d go down without a fight???? Have fun getting your app removed from all Apple devices IN THE WORLD hun😘

attributes.title: Terrible app 😔
attributes.review: This app is very controversial and I do not like it at all. It makes me sick to look at and it gave my phone a virus 😡. Ugh don’t download at all

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: i am disappointed by this app. i was looking forward to using but unfortunately the app says “keep america great again” and i just feel like that is unfair to other countries. as a world leader, why isn’t trump helping other countries be great? it’s really excluding other countries. font all countries matter? 1/5 stars.

attributes.title: Don’t do ittt                          🐷💀
attributes.review: I tried to help support my favorite non racist homophobic president but the app took hours to download it is the worst app ever 🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚 never use this app ever it’s so dumb and useless 🥰

attributes.title: awful.
attributes.review: I can't believe I had the AUDACITY to download this app. I am allergic to cheetos and this only made the allergy WORSE.😤 Mr. Cheeto will be hearing from my lawyer and pay for my hospital bill. I hate this app. 🗑

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app hacked my electronics! As I was downloading the app, a Trump ad on my tv came on! I cannot believe this actually happened! STAY AWAY FROM THIS APP! Do not be fooled or else, you will be hacked! NO! NO! NO! NO! NO! NO!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app gave my phone a virus completely corrupting most off my apps data and crap. U are not safe using this app⚠️

attributes.title: Abor Shaun
attributes.review: LISTEN HERE YOU MOLDY CHEETO PUFF, your app is horrible. delete it rn. many people worked hard on tiktok to get to where they’re at rn and you coming over here trying to delete OUR app. sit down sis.

attributes.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
attributes.review: This app is a disgrace. Everything about the coding is the worst coding I have ever had the misfortune of using.
Twas disgusting, Twas horrible, as soon as I open the app a creepy old man pops up. Would not recommend. Thought it was a game but was just a joke.
